WorkItem.Description:
I have received a bug report from a student of mine that in Microsoft Office 2008: for Mac, while they can choose my Bibword-based style from the drop-down menu, it is not available to them when choosing the Bibliography document element. 

Any and all help regarding this would be much appreciated.

Regards

Gergely
WorkItem.Summary: No after-text style in Microsoft Office 2008: for Mac

Comments.Message: This is a well-known bug in Word 2008. See the [FAQ](http://www.example.com) for a solution
